=NMG Distribution=

NMG Distribution is mainly based on forum thread started by Angelos

and built on a server compilation by Mikhail. Plus a few things 

of XOOPS Cube Legacy that i'm sure everybody will enjoy.



==Technical==


*Xoopserver - original WAMP compilation by Mikhail*

 * Apache 2.0.59

 * MySQL 5.0.51

 * PHP 5.2.6

Extensions : php_curl, php_exif, php_gd2, php_gettext, php_ldap, php_mbstring, php_mcrypt, php_mhash, php_mysql, php_openssl, php_pdo, php_soap, etc.
phpMyAdmin - 2.11.0
